title: How To Make Hologram Projector at Home
description: This project outlines how to create a simple hologram projector at home using a smartphone and a transparent pyramid-shaped device. The device creates a pseudo-holographic effect by reflecting 2D videos from the smartphone screen, giving the illusion of a 3D image.
steps: Create a rough diagram of a pyramid side on graph paper. For a medium-sized pyramid, use the following dimensions: Base = 18 cm, Height = 10.5 cm, Top = 1 cm (or 2 cm). For a small pyramid, use: Base = 6 cm, Height = 3.5 cm, Top = 1 cm.
Cut four pieces of acrylic glass or CD case material according to the dimensions determined in the graph paper diagram.
Join the four glass pieces together using tape or super glue to form a pyramid shape.
Search on YouTube for 'hologram videos' or '4 SIDE hologram videos'.
Place the finished pyramid projector in the center of the smartphone screen while playing one of the hologram videos. Turn off the room lights for better visibility of the holographic effect.
